statements: DELETE FROM temperature_data WHERE time = '2022-01-15 08:00:00' AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM temperature_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND temperature < 30.0;
DELETE FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature >= 35.0 AND location IN ('San Francisco', 'Los Angeles');
DELETE FROM temperature_stats WHERE stats_id = 100 AND avg_temperature < 50;
DELETE FROM temperature_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND temperature > 80
DELETE FROM location_data WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM temperature_records WHERE temperature > 30 AND location_id = 1;
